channel.title: Gauntlet Community Open Gaming-- Registration Opens June 1
channel.description: Our next free online gaming event opens for registration on June 1st at 1200 Eastern US. Right now we have 26 individual events plus a wrap up session. We'll also be adding a couple of panel/seminars. Behold the wondrous games: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/all-events-info GCOG takes place June 24th to June 27th with events in a variety of time slots. You can see more info about this FREE, yes I said FREE, ttrp event here. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/gauntlet-community-open-gaming.html
